message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to offer it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. Would you be willing to consider $90?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $95.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $98.
I'm getting close to your price, but I still need to save a bit more. Would you be willing to go down to $96?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $99.
I'm really close to walking away, but I still think I can get a better deal. Would you be willing to go down to $97?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already given you a good deal. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $100.

I understand you're not willing to go any lower, but I really need to stay within my budget. I'm willing to make a final offer of $95. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to walk away and buy from John for $80.
